WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

As of Prism v4, the NewsFeedService in the StockTraderRI.Modules.News specifies an invariant culture when obtaining the PublishedDate field, as shown in this fragment from the NewsFeedService constructor:

PublishedDate = DateTime.Parse(x.Attribute("PublishedDate").Value, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)

Thank you for your feedback.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
WorkItem.Description: in the Data/News.xml file, the PublishedDate field throws an exception if the date format is not US (M/D/YYYY) format
WorkItem.Summary: Does not support all date formats
